channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Danger of drowning -Broken fence leading to river, 20th November
item.description:
The fence is broken leading from the pavement to the river, a child could easily fall in and drown, believe this needs immediate attention. Hampden Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hampden Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in bin store. Bins no longer accessible, 20th November
item.description:
A single mattress and bed base was left in the middle of the bin store a number of weeks ago (3-4) which meant access to bins was limited. Main bins and recycling now overflowing and completely inaccessible for over a week and appears bins have not been emptied as they should have been on schedule.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harlinger Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: High Street (Penge) SE20 number 15 – 17 – of, 20th November
item.description:
High Street (Penge) SE20 number 15 – 17 – off white concrete painted sill under bricked up corner window at High Street /Crampton Road junction graffiti tagged – Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4179312,-0.0593119,3a,43.5y,88.5h,89.03t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sa1W3AHEwpMuMGeKoyPYz2g!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D0.9737969382217386%26panoid%3Da1W3AHEwpMuMGeKoyPYz2g%26yaw%3D88.49555047444856!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTExNy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

item.title: Road markings obstructed by spillage, 20th November
item.description:
Entrance to Woolacombe Road from Eastbrook road is a mess after a spillage if white material this week. There is a parked vehicle on the entrance/exit and trail of white stains and puddle covering the road markings. Please review and arrange clean-up / repainting. The parked vehicle should also be removed as its obstructing the 386 bus causing congestion on entrance/exit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolacombe Road, Kidbrooke, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Overhanging buddlia at end of lower station road, 20th November
item.description:

item.title: Leaf debris Crofton Road, 20th November
item.description:
Would it be possible to clear the leaves on Crofton Road. It’s making it difficult to use/pass through with wheelchairs and prams. Many thanks!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Crofton Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive weed growth, 20th November
item.description:
There is excessive weed growth at no. 92 that keeps growing into the property at no. 90. It’s fast growing and is not maintained. Is there any way that the council can come and remove it from the front garden as it’s damaging the hedge at no. 90 and our bin structure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Crofton Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole assault course, 20th November
item.description:
Again, Bexley close off tickets without doing any work. This road is still riddled with dangerous potholes to the point we are seeing drivers swerving in the road into the cycle lane and nearly knocking someone off their bike. Are the council waiting for a death to occur before actually doing something?! Can you please fix these!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflow of fallen leaves, spilling over into private gardens causing blockage to our drains. Also safety hazard when they get wet and slippery., 20th November
item.description:
This a cumulation of past several weeks of no street cleaning. This is on Colberg Place and the surrounding streets, East Bank, Dunsmure Rd, Wilderton Rd and Linthorpe Rd. It is a hazard every time we leave the house.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colberg Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
